review: Love it...bought a new smart tv over the holidays that was supposed to do essentially the same thing. However. You have to have your wireless modem no more that five feet away from the tv go get a signal. Be careful if you are looking at vizio wi fi tv's.the fire tv has no problems even being two rooms away. Has lots of great apps as well. More than came with the tv in the first place.downside......it makes it really easy to spend money..get prime and save yourself hundreds on rental and shipping..plus.....its portable. Internet signal and your good to go.
